nodes.bodyText: Should we consider keeping the no arg method and have that just return the default size?
Note, if we did, it would be for the series of methods - and it would reduce a number of the changes classes in this PR.
Attn @landreev ... there is another issue that represents additional thumbnail improves that might cover this ... Dataset Thumbnail API - Size Parameter #5679.
I'm not sure I understand the question, but I think the answer is that code is doing the right thing as is.

I mean, it's not even clear which size to consider the "default", for the datasets in particular, anymore. Since all these different parts of the application now need different size thumbnails, it actually felt confusing to have a size-less method for just one of them. And I don't think it would keep things simpler/cleaner overall.
Thank you for the discussion, @landreev and @scolapasta. Any pertinent details of the decisions here should be moved to #5679. Resolving.
There was already "dataset.link=Link Dataset" and "dataset.email.datasetContactBtn=Email Dataset Contact" as examples. Are these now gone / no longer used? Should we be cleaning these up?

nodes.bodyText: Reviewed and resolved duplicates. Organized the bundle a bit to group msg's better. Will have an opportunity to revisit the link btn and msg text in issue #6772. There is ample opportunity to review and refactor the other 2,500+ lines of bundle text, as suggested in #4825.
